Text: Re Random House Drafts Cc was revised The index was changed Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Jeff Harbert PM To Dale CT Lucy CT cc Steve CT Sara CT Subject Random House Drafts Attached are draft deal tickets for transactions which could close today pending todays negotiations Please prepare updated drafts today if at all possible Earlier drafts were prepared on June that were similar to each of these tickets Thanks JH

Re Random House Drafts Cc was revised The index was changed Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Jeff Harbert PM To Dale CT Lucy CT cc Steve CT Sara CT Subject Random House Drafts Attached are draft deal tickets for transactions which could close today pending todays negotiations Please prepare updated drafts today if at all possible Earlier drafts were prepared on June that were similar to each of these tickets Thanks JH

PULPEX clarificationI seem to recall from our earlier conversation that London can trade on the PULPEX but cannot trade as a marketmaker That can only be done out of Houston Is this understanding correct and if so why is that The reason why I ask is that eventually we would like to move the marketmaking function over to London regards steve
